title: Segmind
description: Segmind is your one-stop platform for building and deploying generative AI workflows. Choose from over 200 pre-trained models for image, text, audio, and video generation. Effortlessly create multimodal Gen AI pipelines and deploy them as APIs using our no-code workflow tool, PixelFlow. You can also fine-tune the latest open-source image models, like Flux.1, in just a few clicks. Our serverless infrastructure ensures efficient and scalable API deployment.
